|specialfeat = <!-- Features that don't fit any place else, Leave blank for none --> |flags = Micro SD Card slot, 8"/10" LCD display, XBEE socket, speaker, Audio out (3.5 mm), RTC w/ battery, UART, CAN Bus, Touchscreen |addchip = Hi-Speed USB Transceiver w/ULPI Interface;SMSC;USB3315;;1;,,, Serial Real Time Clock Chip;STMicro;M41T00S;;1;,,, 2.7V 11-14Bit Digital Temperature Sensor;TI;LM73;;1;,,, PMIC for i.MX35/51;Freescale Semiconductor;MC13892;;1;,,, Low Power Stereo Codec;Freescale Semiconductor;SGTL5000;;1;,,, Touch Screen Digitizer;Analog Devices;AD7843;;1;,,, 3.3V Programmable LVDS Transmitter 24-Bit Flat Panel Display Link;TI;DS90C385A;;1;,,, FPGA w/8K LUTs;Lattice;LFXP2-8E;;1;,,, FPGA w/5K LUTs;Lattice;LFXP2-5E;;1;,,, PoE IEEE 802.3af PD Interface w/Integrated Switching Regulator;Linear Technology;LTC4267-1;;1;,,, 5V RS232 Transceiver;Sipex;SP213E;;1;,,, 5V RS-485/RS-422 Transceiver;Sipex;SP4082E;;3;,,, High-Speed CAN Transceiver;NXP;TJA1050T;;2;,,, 1-Channel Transistor Output Optocoupler;Lite-On;LTV-357T;;1;,,, Dual Switching Diode;Diodes Inc;BAV99;;2;,,, Low-Voltage Adjustable Shunt Regulator;TI;TLV431A;;1;,,, 42V Constant On-Time PFET Buck Switching Controller;TI;LM25085;;1;,,, 150V N-Channel Powertrench MOSFET;Fairchild;FDC2512;;1;,,, 1A 1000V Bridge Rectifier;Diodes Inc.;DF10S;;2; 40V P-Channel Enhancement Mode MOSFET;Diodes Inc.;DMP4051;;1;,,, Dual-Channel Power Distribution Switch;Microchip;MIC2026-1BM;;1;,,, Silicon Switching Diode Array;Infineon;BGX50A;;4;,,, 3-State Octal Bus Transceiver;NXP;74LVC245A;;5;,,, 27V ESD Protection Diode;ON Semi;NUP2105L;;2;,,, Data Selector/Multiplexer w/3-State Output;TI;SN74HC251;;1;,,, Microprocessor Reset Circuit;ST Micro;STM1001;;2;,,, 1.3MHz Step-Up Switching Regulator w/1.4A Switch;Semtech;S4503;;1;,,, UHS Buffer w/3-State Output;ON Semi;NC7SZ125;;1;,,, 725mW Audio Power Amplifier w/Shutdown Mode;TI;LM4864;;1;,,, Octal Edge-Triggered D-Type Flip-Flop w/3-State Output;TI;SN74LVC374A;;1;,,, 2.5MHz 2A Synchronous Step-Down Regulator;Semtech;SC183C;;1;,,, Tri-Mode 300mA LDO Regulator w/Enable;ON Semi;NCP585;;2;,,, 1.5A Low Quiescent Current Synchronous Buck Regulator;Renesas;ISL8009A;;1;,,, Dual Inverter Gate;TI;SN74LVC2G04;;1; |802dot11_protocols = none

|buttons = <!-- buttons available --> |led = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |dimensions = <!-- Size of device {{convert |length|x|widthordepth|x|height|in|mm}} --> |weight = <!-- Weight of device {{convert|weight|oz|g}} -->
}}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== ===Hardware specification=== *CPU: [[Freescale (NXP)]] i.MX51 (MCIMX515CJM6C) :ARM (Cortex-A8) @600MHz *Storage: 512MB (NAND) Flash, :TF card (max.128GB)/MMC card slot *Memory: 256MB (DDR2) SDRAM *USB: 2x USB 2.0 ports *PCI: 1x PCIe (USB only) port *Network: 2x FE ports *Power Source: 5-28V via 2-pin connector or 802.3af PoE
==Links of Interest== ===Documentation=== *[https://docs.embeddedts.com/TS-TPC-8900-4800 ''Baseboard Documentation''] *[https://docs.embeddedts.com/TS-4800 ''Computer-on-Module Documentation''] *[https://github.com/embeddedarm ''Code Respository'']
